name: Grand Magus
description:
The Grand Magus has been trapped in an endless training loop to master the abilities of his enemies, you can't cast any spells unless you steal them from enemies that have just used them. 

You can also rewind time in a concentrated area to gain health back or recover spells you have already used, this can also be used if you are falling off the map and need to get back up.

There are 4 spells you can currently steal; 

Blink, which teleports you to a destination set by your mouse position. 

Frostbite, it is an AoE ability that damages enemy warlocks inside of it, warlocks can dodge this.

Arcane Bolt, shoots a projectile forward and kills any who comes in contact with it, warlocks can dodge this.

Piano Toss, throws a piano up in the sky and lands on enemies instantly killing them, warlocks can't dodge this.

I took inspiration from Rubick, a hero from the game Dota 2.

This was my submission to Lodum Dare 47 - Stuck in a loop.
